price: Mwenyezi Mungu akasema: Hakika Mimi nitakuteremshieni hicho. Lakini yeyote katika nyinyi atakaye kanya baadae, basi hakika Mimi nitampa adhabu nisiyopata kumpa yeyote katika walimwengu.
arabic: قَالَ ٱللَّهُ إِنِّي مُنَزِّلُهَا عَلَيۡكُمۡۖ فَمَن يَكۡفُرۡ بَعۡدُ مِنكُمۡ فَإِنِّيٓ أُعَذِّبُهُۥ عَذَابٗا لَّآ أُعَذِّبُهُۥٓ أَحَدٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu akamwambia: Mimi nitakuteremshieni chakula kutoka mbinguni. Lakini mtu yeyote atakaye pinga neema hii baada ya kuteremka, basi Mimi nitampa adabu ambayo sijapata kumpa mtu yeyote. Kwani huyo atakuwa anakanya baada ya kwisha shuhudia dalili ya Imani aliyo itaka mwenyewe.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla al-lahu innī munazziluhā ʿalaykum faman yakfur baʿdu minkum fa-innī uʿadhibuhu ʿadhāban lā uʿadhibuhu aḥadan mina al-ʿālamīna
